BE it enacted by the Queen’s Most Excellent Majesty, by and with the advice and consent of the Senate end the House of Representatives of Ceylon in this present Parliament assembled, and by the . authority of the same as follows :—
4, This Act may be cited as the Kandyan Mar- shut sith, riage and Divorce (Amendment) Act, No. 84 of 1954.

“and the provisions of this Act, other than section 47, shall come into operation on each date (hereinafter referred to as “the appointed date”) as the Minister may appoint ite Order published in the Gazetté, and section 47 shall come into operation when this Act becomes an Act of Parliament. ’*.
